Function reference

All functions

CapStr()
Capitalise input string
REFERENCE_DATASETS
RNAsum Reference Datasets
arriba_pdf_read()
Read Arriba PDF File
arriba_process()
Process Arriba Fusions
arriba_summary_write()
Write Arriba Fusion Summary
arriba_tsv_read()
Read Arriba TSV File
barPlot()
Generate bar-plot for selected genes
cdfPlot()
Generate CDF plot for selected gene
civicDrugTable()
Generate table with drugs targeting selected set of genes
cn_subset()
Copy Number Subset Table
combineDatasets()
Combine sample expression profile with reference datasets
cumsum_ordered()
Calculate cumulative sum
densityPlot()
Generate density and expression distribution plots for selected gene
dragen_fusions_process()
Process DRAGEN Fusions
dragen_fusions_read()
Read DRAGEN Fusions
dragen_mapping_metrics_read()
Read DRAGEN Mapping Metrics
empty_tbl()
Create Empty Tibble Given Column Names
exprGroupStats_groupWise()
Calculate group-wise median, standard deviation, quantiles and cumulative fractions.
exprGroupsStats_geneWise()
Calculate gene-wise median, sd, quantiles and cumulative fractions for expression data
exprTable()
Generate table with coloured cells indicating expression values for selected genes
fusions_annot()
Annotate Fusions with Ensembl Coordinates
fusions_preprocess()
Pre-Process Arriba or DRAGEN Fusions
fusions_summary()
Get Arriba/DRAGEN Fusions Summary
fusions_table()
Fusions Table Display
genes_pcgr_summary()
Get Mutated Genes from PCGR
getColours()
Assign colours to different elements
get_refdata()
Get Reference Data File Paths
get_refgenes()
Get Reference Genes
glanceExprPlot()
Generate boxplot presenting expression profiles for selected set of genes
immune_summary()
Get Immune Gene Summary
known_trans()
Get Known Translocations
known_translocations_cgi_process()
Process CGI Known Translocations
mutCNexprPlot()
Generate scatterplot with per-gene expression values (y-axis), CN values (x-axis) and mutation status info (colours), if provided
nearest_position()
Check for nearest value in a vector
pca()
Perform PCA
pcgr_expr()
Get PCGR genes with hits
pcgr_tiers_tsv_read()
Read PCGR TSV File
perc_rank()
Convert a vector of numbers into corresponding vector of their percentiles
ppl_cnv_som_gene_read()
Read PURPLE CNV Gene File
prepare2write()
Prepare object to write into a file
purple_cnv_summary()
Get PURPLE CNV Summary
rcircos_cyto_info38()
RCircos HG38 CytoBandIdeogram Object
rcircos_plot()
RCircos Plot
read_sample_data()
Read Sample Data
read_wgs_data()
Read WGS Data
rnasum_rmd()
Generate UMCCR RNAsum Report
salmon_counts()
Get Salmon Counts
saveWidgetFix()
Wrapper for saveWidget bug fix
session_info_kable()
Session Information Kable
session_info_tbls()
Session Information Tables
sv_process()
Process SV Object
sv_summary()
Get SV Summary
tpm_from_rpkm()
Calculate TPM from RPKM
webplot()
Generate spider web plots to present immunogram genes
